title: CravePizza
description: Worked closely with a cross-functional team to build an e-commerce platform with a user-friendly interface. Developed the front-end using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring responsive design for all devices. Integrated APIs and payment gateways for seamless and secure transactions.

title: ITMS - Collage ERP System (Freelance)
description: The College ERP System website is designed for Government Polytechnic Awasari College. It is built using the MERN stack.

title: TedxVITPune
description: TEDxVITPune is an independently organised TED event with the mission is to learn, share and discuss “Ideas. Worth Spreading” that have the power and potential to make a difference. The event is organized completely by students.

title: Dental College, Ahmednagar (Freelance)
description: Dental College of Shri. Yashwantrao Chavan Memorial Medical and Rural Development Foundation. Established in 2007, this esteemed institution stands as one of Ahmednagar's premier dental colleges in India. It pays tribute to the memory of Shri. Yashwantrao-ji Chavan

title: Brand ASAP(Learning Project)
description: During my journey as a web developer, I embarked on a personal learning project to expand my skills and explore new technologies. For this purpose, I chose to work on a project that involved utilizing GSAP.
